name: tentree Palm Sunset Embroidery Crew - Women's
description:
Two reasons this top will make you feel good: it’s soft and comfy when you put it on, and it’s made with environmentally conscious materials. Win-win all around.Midweight tri-fabric blend keeps you warm without weighing you down.Regular fit wears like an old favourite.tentree makes quality apparel and ensures that 10 trees are planted for every piece sold.
